message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to own our premium product. This item holds significant value to both of us, as it's worth $10000 to you and represents a substantial investment for me. Considering its unique features and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the chance to acquire it at a special introductory price of $9500. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to respond promptly if you're interested in securing this exceptional deal.
